articles.title: Eight years of conservative rule in Poland ends as Donald Tusk becomes prime minister - The Associated Press
articles.description: The new Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk has been sworn in by the president in a ceremony where each of his ministers was also taking the oath of office. The swearing-in ceremony of the pro-European Union government on Wednesday morning marks the final step …
articles.content:
WARSAW, Poland (AP) The new Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk was sworn in by the president on Wednesday morning in a ceremony where each of his ministers was also taking the oath of office.
